Lynwood.StubHub Center:
StubHub Center, formerly the Home Depot Center, is a multiple-use sports complex located on the campus of California State University, Dominguez Hills in Carson, California. It is approximately fourteen miles (23 km) south of Downtown Los Angeles and its primary tenants are the LA Galaxy of Major League Soccer.
Opened in 2003, its title sponsor since 2013 is online ticket marketplace StubHub.
